      • getTimeout

        public int getTimeout()

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int timeout)
        Set the timeout for discovery polls. If a timeout is reached, other servers will be tried until the list is exhausted, in which case the data node list will not be updated until the next poll interval.
